operation.command: update B{ENV_NAME}.ADRESSE set ADRPA1 = 'RES LES BAMBOUS APT 3' where ADRCAF = '02018000007994'

select 1 from sgengpp.gpp_adresse_domicile a inner join sgengpp.gpp_moyen_contact m on m.id = a.id_fk_ap inner join sgengpp.gpp_personne_physique p on m.fk_personne_physique = p.numero_interne where p.matricule = '540003' and m.date_fin_validite is null and a.complement = 'RES LES BAMBOUS APT 3'
update B{ENV_NAME}.ADRESSE set ADRPA1 = 'RES LES BAMBOUS APT 2' where ADRCAF = '02018000007994'
